model

Class MyPongModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MyPongModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PongModel

    public class MyPongModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements PongModel
    MyPongModel keeps track of the bars, the ball and the game state. MyPongModel consists of a Left and Right Player(PlayerModel), a FieldSize, a message shown on the top of the screen, a left and right Bar(BarModel), a ball(BallModel) and a boolean GameWon that tells whether a player has won or not.
    Author:
    Daniel and Oscar

      • handleCollisions

        public void handleCollisions()
        Method that handles ball collisions. Makes the ball bounce on the top and bottom of the game field. It also runs the balls bounce methods if it bounces on a bar.
